abstract: Derek Fisher, Los Angeles Lakers point guard and National Basketball Players Assn president, has been the primary voice of the players' union in the current NBA lockout.
snippet: The Los Angeles Lakers veteran, as union president, publicly delivers the players’ position and privately helps to influence negotiations.
lead_paragraph: The Los Angeles Lakers veteran, as union president, publicly delivers the players’ position and privately helps to influence negotiations.

headline.main: Derek Fisher, Champion Point Guard and Face of the Players Union
headline.print_headline: Champion Point Guard and the Face of the Union
headline.seo: Derek Fisher, Champion Point Guard and Face of the Players Union
